Content Analysis.section_instruction: Evaluate the text based on the following criteria and make your selections.

Relevance.tooltip: Check if the text is relevant to the topic of interest.
Relevance.example:
Relevant: 'The paragraph discusses the topic directly.'
Irrelevant: 'The text strays off-topic and provides no useful information.'

Quality Assessment.section_instruction: Assess the quality of the text.

Clarity.tooltip: Rate the clarity of the text on a scale from 1 to 5.
Clarity.example:
Clear: 'The text is concise and easy to understand.'
Unclear: 'The text is convoluted and difficult to follow.'

Categorization.section_instruction: Categorize the text based on the predefined categories.

Category.tooltip: Select the most appropriate category for the text.
Category.example:
Category 1: 'The text fits well into the first category due to its focus on X.'
Category 3: 'Given its emphasis on Y, the text belongs to the third category.'
